title: Beware the Boogeyman (SCP-015-IT)
content:
**Welcome to SCP Rookies - Series 2!**

**Episode 11 - Beware the Boogeyman**

When a containment breach catches him less than prepared, newly promoted Senior Agent Indigo must improvise.

Inspired by [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-015-it].

Season 1 can be found at my [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:animated-series-rookies-fifty3dragons animation hub].
